content: 5 12 11 10 9 3 3 8 7 6 5 3 3 5 5 4 3 2 3 3 3 3 3 3 1 setup round key knit k5tog sl1 pwise with yarn at wrong side 3 k1 into next st without dropping off left needle yo k1 into same st drop st off left needle 3 k1 into next st without dropping off left needle yo k1 into same st drop st off left needle yo on following round drop final yo off needle without working 3 yo k1 into next st without dropping off left needle yo k1 into same st drop st off left needle yo on following round drop first & last yos off needle without working slip all 3 or 5 stitches worked into 1 st on the previous round pwise with yarn at wrong side 5 round 1 sl1 round 2 k1 round 3 insert right needle tip into the stitch below the next st on the left needle going through the fabric from front to back wrap yarn as if to knit and pull a loop of yarn through to the right side then work yo k1 yo k1 into the same stitch drop next stitch off left needle wihout working c2b-k3tog sl next st to cable needle and hold at back k3tog k1 from cable needle c2f-k3tog sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold at front k1 k 3 sts on cable needle decrease c3b-k3tog sl next 2 sts to cable needle and hold at back k3tog k2 from cable needle c3f-k3tog sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold at front k2 k 3 sts on cable needle decrease c4b-k3tog sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold at back k3tog k3 from cable needle c4f-k3tog sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold at front k3 k 3 sts on cable needle decrease licht hat by ysolda v1 1 6
